{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Beeline |model=SmartBox |revision=Pro |series=AC1200 |serialnum_prefix=SG15 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model=S1500 |manuf_rev=AWI |availability=Beeline only? |est_release_date=12/2014 |pcb_id=AWI00E-1.6 |type=wireless router, CPE |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L2G81A-25T |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M16FP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, J3 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J4 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7602EN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot;UBI; |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Beeline_2G_XXXXXX, Beeline_5G_XXXXXX |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=D4:21:22 |oui_eth=D4:21:22 }} {{TagLine|Beeline SmartBox Pro AC1200 Wireless Router}} :[http://moskva.beeline.ru/shop/details/router-bilain-smart-box-pro-black/ Product page] "AWI00E-1.6" and "PALWONN" is silkscreened on the board in the photos. ===Reviews=== *[http://www.content-review.com/articles/29898/ Review on '''content-review.com'''] :''SerComm'' manuf. ([http://www.palwonn.com.tw/en/web/about_us-profile.html Palwonn]) [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:61988-41#1650 ''iXBT''] *[http://itreviewer.ru/reviews/27621/obzor-smart-box-pro-besprovodnogo-routera-ot-bilajn/ Review on '''itreviewer.ru'''] :OUI: D4:21:22 ([http://www.sercomm.com/contpage.aspx?langid=8&type=prod3&L1id=27&L2id=22&L3id=87&Prodid=370 SerComm]) [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:59612-2#55 ''iXBT''] *[http://habrahabr.ru/company/beeline/blog/251489/ ''Beeline SmartBox Pro'' review on '''Beeline'''] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz [[MIPS32|MIPS 1004Kc]] :Flash: 256MB SLC NAND ''ESMT'' ([http://www.esmt.com.tw/english/products_de.asp?CLASS_L1=8&CLASS_L2=179&CLASS_L3=0&CLASS_L4=0 F59L2G81A]) [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:61988-41#1650 ''iXBT''] :RAM: 256MB DDR3 ''Nanya'' ([http://www.nanya.com/PageEdition3.aspx?Menu_ID=109&def=210&lan=en-us NT5CB128M16BP]) [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:61988-41#1645 ''iXBT''] :WLAN 2.4GHz: [[MediaTek]] MT7602E 2T2R 802.11bgn :WLAN 5GHz: [[MediaTek]] MT7612E 2T2R 802.11an+ac :Antenna: 2x 3.2dBi (2.4GHz), 2x 4.5dBi (5GHz) internal ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:59612-8 ''Beeline SmartBox Pro'' on '''iXBT''' forums] :Update and PCB photos (thanks to [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62022-143#5215 '''sahe''']) :Flash: ''ESMT'' F59L2G81A-25T (A9P1P38H2) 256MB ::(SLC NAND, 2Gb, x8, 3.3v, 25ns, 48-pin TSOP) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CB128M16FP-DI 256MB ::(DDR3-1600, 2Gb, x16, 1.5v, 96-ball BGA) :Mini PCIe: J2 (52-pin, R274÷R279 on the board in the photos) ::[https://wikidevi.com/wiki/SparkLAN_WPER-176AC Wi-Fi 802.11ac] Card / [http://www.ebay.com/bhp/mini-pci-e-ssd SSD] / [http://www.ebay.com/itm/mSATA-Mini-PCI-e-SATA-SSD-slot-To-7pin-SATA-HDD-Converter-Card-Adapter-Bracket-/181719824071 HDD w/ adapter] *[http://zepete.livejournal.com/129317.html ''Beeline SmartBox Pro'' on '''zepete''' LJ] (internal images) :[http://zepete.livejournal.com/129553.html Firmware] • [http://zepete.livejournal.com/129864.html Bootlog] • [http://zepete.livejournal.com/130179.html SuperUser] • [http://zepete.livejournal.com/130471.html PSU] :''I.T.E. Power Supply MU18-R120150-C5'' *[https://telegra.ph/OpenWrt-for-Beeline-SmartBox-PRO-09-29 ''Beeline SmartBox PRO'' OpenWrt firmware] ===Superuser account=== Superuser account gives you access to some additional settings and :allows to change network settings (initially locked by Beeline) To use it login to web admin panel with this account: *Login: '''SuperUser''' *Password: '''Beeline$martB0xPr0''' from v2.0.15: *Password: serial number ===Serial=== 
  J4 
1 - GND
2 - Tx
3 - Vcc
4 - Rx
 ===See also=== *[[Beeline SmartBox]] N300 Wireless Router :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197D @660MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 64MB :WLAN: 802.11bgn 2х2 MIMO *[[Beeline SmartBox One]] N600 Wireless Router :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8197DL @700MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 64MB :WLAN 2.4GHz: 802.11bgn 2х2 MIMO :WLAN 5GHz: 802.11an 2х2 MIMO ==Images== File:SmartBox Pro PCB 1.jpeg|PCB top File:SmartBox Pro PCB 2.jpeg|PCB bottom File:SmartBox Pro PCB top.jpeg|SmartBox Pro board [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
